geeting.label: Greetings, Industries Hyderabad Ohana!
geeting.description: We are delighted to present the first volume of Industries Cares newsletter! This volume presents a recap of Industries VTO events and a glimpse of what’s to come!

sections.title: What happened in the past few months?

activities.title: Tree Plantation
activities.description: We had 20 volunteers plant a 100 saplings to support our mission to plant for the planet and save our ecosystem!

activities.title: Lab Setup
activities.description: We set up 2x24 switches to accommodate up to 48 desktops and provide 2x the internet connection!

activities.title: Computer Classes
activities.description: Weekly programming basics classes to ~60 students from 9th grade. We will end the course with a hackathon!

action.description: Interested in donating to Jyothi Vidyalaya
action.label: Click Here to Donate

sections.title: What are we looking at ahead?

activities.title: Menstrual Care
activities.description: Creating an awareness about menstrual care for adolescent girls. This will empower girls with knowledge to manage menstruation with safety

activities.title: Career Counselling
activities.description: Creating an awareness among school children about various career options & igniting their passion.

activities.title: Diwali Activities
activities.description: This Diwali, we are conducting a slew of exciting activities with children of all classes (LKG to 10th)!

action.description: Interested in Volunteering for one of these?
action.label: Sign Up

footer.title: Interested in volunteering? Got questions?
footer.description: If you haven’t already, be sure to join the group and set your notification preference to Every Post, so you never miss out on any updates.
